text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump right now the % of people diagnosed with #COVID19 in the US is 2.5% BUT the true number is likely much lower because we know most have mild symptoms Abd are not being counted. That’s why antibodies test showing way more bad it the death rate goes down https://t.co/dzkTsfUJ5s https://t.co/XPfKrwQxEk
